commit message: Added support for spoiler text.

Moved to gradle with Android Studio

Nothing special in the build.gradle yet
Format code with Android Studio
Fix deprecated method
Clear the captcha input field when new captcha gets loaded.

Revert 'Fix deprecated method'

This reverts commit 8c8428965a1082dceb965e5a38277c1cdee20d6b.
Fixed the reload timer not always firing
Remove unused NetworkPhotoView
Don't create a folder in ImageSaver when the user hasn't pressed OK yet.
Trim board code value

Don't show notification when background watching is disabled

This could happen if the WatchService loop did an iteration in the background.

Add debug option to make a post a saved reply.
Fix some pin watching bugs.
Made timeout when a pin was viewed 2s
Made ChanBuild with release/debug variants
Wrong method oops

Theming support.

Light, dark & black theme available. Not all are done yet.
The switcher in settings smoothly transitions the different themes.
ThemeHelper added with helper function ThemeHelper.setTheme(Activity) to
be used in Activity.onCreate to set the theme.
Update readme with irc and todo list.
Fix used libraries license location in readme
Move website link down with the other links

LoaderPool: check instance of Loader, not just equals

While only checking equals seems like a right choice,
the list position is not shared anymore this way.
Finished dark theme and added black theme.
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/Floens/Clover
Fix new quotes not always making the new quotes count increase.

Better notification text for watching.

Add debug logs for the pinwatcher.
Use UTF-8 when posting.
Fix thread urls open and share
Enable thumbnail tap to dismiss.

Disabled the boardedit autofiller.

It confuses people when they want to add NSFW
boards because the auto filler hides NSFW boards.
Add a way to specify keystore data in another file.
Beta release
Update readme with beta link.
Only reset pin.watchLastCount when it is valid.
Fix for Android bug that causes duplicate baseactivity launches.

Store cache files on the dir returned by getExternalCacheDir, if available.
Closes #7
Added beta build flavor.
Only set the list position once in SettingFragment.
Start video again when it's selected when autoplay is enabled.
Remove delayed playback for videos.
Play videos on autoplay when they are selected.

Make the icons in the replies popup light if using a dark theme.

Programmatically and not in xml because it already references a style,
and this is easier.
Pin thread on successful post.
Add an AlertDialog with a WebView for unknown pass login responses.

Revert 'Fix for Android bug that causes duplicate baseactivity launches.'

This reverts commit 3349945f368ace28ddc891c33d9275fdaf463b8b.

This fix breaks the actionbar up.
Add option for auto refreshing threads.
Add an auto load image preference.
Show play button when auto load image is disabled for webms.
Auto load imageS
Made spoiler color lighter on the black theme.
Check in .iml files
Update build tools version to 19.1 and set java to 1.7
Added '(OP)' to the end of the quote link when its links to the OP
